entities: African Union High Level Implementation Panel
summary:
Stresses the importance of cooperation between the Governments of Sudan and Southern Sudan for peace, security, and stability 

 Calls on the Governments of Sudan and Southern Sudan to resolve the final status of Abyei peacefully 

 Requests the Secretary-General to ensure human rights monitoring, report to the Council regularly, and keep the Council informed of progress 

 Decides to review UNISFA's role in 3 months and remain seized of the matter 

 Requests the Secretary-General to ensure UNISFA's compliance with the UN's zero-tolerance policy on sexual exploitation and abuse.
